content:
• Oceanfront balcony with seating
  • Daily shuttle to downtown Key West
  • Luxury furnishings
  • Premium bedding by Connoisseur, towels by Grand Royal
  • High-speed Wi-Fi
  • Flat-screen TV
  • Custom Key West Collection bath products
  • Plush bathrobes by Boca Terry
  • High-quality Serta mattresses
